outputs.output_descr:
The present Initiation Plan (IP) aims to develop a UNV global programme to support peace-building through volunteerism in a number of countries/(sub-)regions that will be identified during UNV Strategic Framework period (2014-2017). The scope of the global programme is to allow the organisation to deliver its results in peace-building, in accordance with the individual requirements of programme countries and partner organisations, by establishing a results and resources framework to guide country-specific initiatives as well as a mechanism to fund national/regional proposals in support of national/regional efforts and UN engagement in peace-building.

Beyond mobilising the necessary expertise to develop the global programme document, the Initiation Plan will support activities identified as necessary to prepare the implementation of the programme, such as (i) a desk review of UNV's previous and current work in peace-building, and of programmes as well as policies of key agencies and organisations in this sector, (ii) consolidation of partnerships with relevant UN entities, governments and Civil Society Organisations (CSOs), including identification of key partners and priority countries/(sub)regions of engagement; (iii) finalisation of the programme document, including the preparation of programme management materials and tools.

project_descr: Initiation Plan (IP)  for the development of UNV Global Programme on Support to Peace-Building through Volunteerism.
project_title: IP Support to Peace-Building through Volunteerism
